attributes.review: For reference, I am an absolutely impartial person. I am blind to all things. However I can see the blatant breach of privacy within this app upon  opening it for the first time! It asks for your phone # and has no option to refuse. The people behind the creation of the app clearly just want your personal data and do not care about the consumer. In fact, thirty minutes after the insanely long download time (3 days!!!) I was greeted by a hostile SWAT TEAM at my doorstep who were peculiarly not wearing masks, because they believed it went against their god given breathing systems and proceeded to pepper spray me in my own home! However, I was wearing a mask because of the dust in my house so I was perfectly fine, I closed my eyes when I realized what was happening and then opened them to see 14 SWAT on the ground coughing their lungs out. I offered them water to which they gratefully accepted before I asked why they were in my house. They answered in unison, ‚ÄúGIVE MONEY TRUMP GOOD,‚Äù before Uncle Sam and Abraham Lincoln came in with two machine guns and rescued me. They reassured me that the bullets only hurt people not wearing masks and that the SWAT team was only asleep. While Uncle Sam and Abraham Lincoln were busy cleaning up the bodies they asked me why these people invaded my house without a warrant. I told them exactly why and I fear the same thing may happen again in the future. I fear for my life constantly now as Abraham Lincoln is no longer here to protect us, all because of this wretched app. Do not download this app, you be plagued by something much worse than any virus.
attributes.title: Absolutely Dissapointed

attributes.review: as soon as I downloaded this app every electronic in my house short circuited starting multiple fires throughout my home, the fires would not go out even once the fire department got here. My house is gone and the fire still rages now but in the shape of a fiery dragon that‚Äôs burning everything in sight. The neighbors have had to move out. Even though I obviously don‚Äôt care about the environment I can‚Äôt help but feel bad about the local wildlife. And the fumes from the fire are creating a smog-like atmosphere in my city, that paired with the already existing Carbon Monoxide, Sulfur Oxides, Carbon Dioxide, and VOCs must really be doing some damage. It‚Äôs definitely not going to make the overall earth cooler. And all of the waste is being moved to landfills so that‚Äôs  good that it‚Äôs out of my way. But it‚Äôs probably leaking methane, chloride, nitrogen, phenols, and even more VOCs. And I heard that all of this stuff will get picked up by any water that enters the landfill and that water could get out if the landfill doesn‚Äôt have a clay lining. And realistically, even if it did that doesn‚Äôt stop all of the harmful chemicals that manage to squeeze their way out into aquifers or nearby rivers, spoiling the local water. Even though a clay lining would reduce this mess, it still would eventually fail and leak even more harmful chemicals into the water and soil, harming the surrounding wildlife. And I guess this could, essentially, ruin the food chain causing animals to either migrate or perish. And it would probably harm the plant life, causing necessary bugs like bees to leave the area or die from pollution. And all of this would decrease overall biodiversity. But I guess there‚Äôs not much I can do. Well... aside from advising others from downloading this app, encourage them to use less waste, educate people on how to recycle, and  continue to educate myself on the impacts of pollution.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP DO NOT DOWNLOAD
